sections.heading: THE PRIVILEGE OF A DEPOSITORArt
sections.text: 3222. Privilege of depositor on thing deposited.He who deposits a thing in the hands of another still remains the owner of it.Consequently his claim to it is preferred to that of the other creditors of the depositary, and he may demand the restitution of it,* if he c
